EUMEN
===================================

.. image:: CQC_logo_png.png
   :width: 150px
   :align: right

``EUMEN`` is an enterprise grade quantum hardware
computational chemistry platform developed and maintained
by `CQC <https://cambridgequantum.com/>`_.  ``EUMEN`` is currently in closed beta.  For enquiries regarding beta access to ``EUMEN``, please contact `eumen-support@cambridgequantum.com <eumen-support@cambridgequantum.com>`_.

To install ``EUMEN``: ``pip install eumen -i <index-url>``. The ``<index-url>`` is provided with the beta credentials.  After installation we recommend getting started by checking out the tutorials included in the private documentation.

.. toctree::
   :caption: Getting Started
   :maxdepth: 1

   introduction
   installation
   key_features
   licence
   opensource
